headline.main: Wild Welcome Greets Rivera At Fox News

lead_paragraph: Geraldo Rivera arrived at the Fox News Channel last week. What a welcome he got. Fox's tough-talking host, Bill O'Reilly, machine-gunned him on his talk show on Thursday night, informing him that the network's audience, perhaps the most conservative in television news, was not happy about his arrival. Mr. Rivera's vocal support of Bill Clinton during the impeachment hearings had tarnished him in their eyes, Mr. O'Reilly said.
abstract: Article discusses reaction, both pro and con, to Fox News Channel hiring Geraldo Rivera as war correspondent (M)
